session_summary.objective: Confirm the GitHub repository setup for DripSim and plan next steps for the 3D farm simulator development in Unity 3D, focusing on irrigated fruit farming (mango and grape) in the sub-médio São Francisco region.

activities.description: Confirmed that the DripSim repository is public at https://github.com/valdomiromorais/dripsim.git. Analyzed the provided GitHub README, which matches the previously created README.md (artifact_id: b5821e41-03f2-4917-8a85-aa71a2467e50) with minor adjustments (e.g., 'Vale do São Francisco' and step numbering). Verified that .gitignore and .gitattributes are correctly set up for Unity files and large assets (.blend, .psd, .tiff) with Git LFS.

Suggested focusing on: (1) Configuring the terrain in dripsim_game/Assets/Scenes/SampleScene.unity with semi-arid textures using URP; (2) Creating prefabs for drippers, mango, and grape plants in dripsim_game/Assets/Prefabs or dripsim_assets; (3) Implementing UI with UI Toolkit for water level and inventory; (4) Adding .blend models in dripsim_assets and exporting as .fbx; (5) Testing existing scripts (PlayerController.cs, IrrigationSystem.cs, PlantSystem.cs). Provided a guide for terrain setup with URP shaders.

next_steps: Configure the terrain in dripsim_game/Assets/Scenes/SampleScene.unity with semi-arid and irrigated textures using URP.
Create prefabs for drippers, mango, and grape plants, storing .blend files in dripsim_assets and .fbx in dripsim_game/Assets/Prefabs.
Implement UI with UI Toolkit in dripsim_game/Assets/UI for resource management (water, seeds, plant status).
Test integration of PlayerController.cs, IrrigationSystem.cs, and PlantSystem.cs in SampleScene.unity.
Add and export .blend models from dripsim_assets to dripsim_game.
